name: Throne's Gift
shortDescription: You accepted the gift, now as you gain experience you hear the music louder and louder. Uncanny knowledge and skill with automated systems - You make the interfaces sign to your ears.
longDescription: Gain the ability to automate any vessel. Unlock more points to automate ships with as you gain experience.

name: Hellspawn
shortDescription: Born to unknown parents in a long forgotten place. At a young age you saw it, the vision guides you. You will take what's yours no matter the cost, even if that's your humanity - It's such a long way down.
longDescription: Gain unnatural abilities on your descent to darkness.
